footer.title: Want to learn more about Carina Chain?

carousel.title1: Issue Exclusive Points/Coupons for Your Store
carousel.title2: Just a Few Steps and 1 Coin (¥500)
carousel.text:
Meet the needs of various retail merchants by issuing custom points/coupons for merchants
Build your own customer base
Encourage repeat visits from customers, increase customer loyalty
Help you expand your store's turnover

content.title: Custom Issue for 1 Coin, Maintenance for 0 Yen
content.text1: Set your own parameter names/descriptions, etc., and issue specialized points or coupons
content.text2: Issuing points or coupons only requires 1 coin worth ¥500
content.text3: Additional issuance or destruction can be done as needed, with only a ¥2 fee per transaction, and no maintenance fees

box1.title: Issuance
box1.text1:
Scan the user's QR code, enter the number of points, specify the coupon, and execute the issuance
Fee is only ¥2 per transaction*
Once the POS linkage function is online, it can be linked with the POS for execution

box2.title: Usage
box2.text1:
Scan the user's QR code, enter the number of points based on the points/coupons held in the user's account, specify the coupon, and execute the usage
Fee is only ¥2 per transaction*
(Once the POS linkage function is online, it can be linked with the POS for execution)

box3.title: Transparent History
box3.text1: The issuance and usage history of points/coupons can be freely checked at any time. The history information is stored on the blockchain to ensure that it cannot be tampered with or disappear

carousel.title2: Free and Flexible, Each Takes What They Need
carousel.text: Points/coupons in the account can be exchanged with other users, allowing points/coupons to be more freely and flexibly used. At the same time, merchants issuing points/coupons also expand their user base

box1.title: Exchange
box1.text1: Users can give points/coupons they hold to other users

box2.title: Exchange (Flea Market)
box2.text1: Users can list the points/coupons they hold in their accounts for exchange in the flea market, and specify the exchange conditions (desired points/coupons).
box2.text2: Other users can exchange the points/coupons they want when they see them in the market.

box3.title: Redemption
box3.text1: Two points issuing merchants can apply to the platform to establish a points redemption pool composed of points from both parties. The exchange rate, redemption fee rate, and redemption limit between points are determined by both merchants.
box3.text2: Users can exchange between two kinds of points through the dual points redemption pool. When using the redemption pool for exchange, users need to pay a certain amount of points to both points issuing merchants as redemption fees. The platform interaction fee is borne by the redemption user.

carousel.title1: Jointly Issued Points/Coupons Usable Across Multiple Merchants
carousel.title2: Like Exclusive Points, Only 1 Coin (500 Yen) Needed
carousel.text1: Support for joint issuance by multiple merchants, customize common points/coupons within your group.
carousel.text2: Build a customer base for the merchant group, enabling resource sharing among merchants.
carousel.text3: Aggregate group resources to maximize overall revenue.

content.title: Custom Issuance for 1 Coin, 0 Yen Maintenance
content.text1: After setting parameters (name/description) for the representative account, common points or coupons can be issued. Once permissions are granted to merchants within the group, they can issue or redeem points/coupons as needed. Issuing points or coupons costs only one 500 yen coin, and issuing or redeeming incurs a fee of 2 yen per transaction, with no maintenance fees.

box1.title: Issuance/Usage
box1.text1: Similar to exclusive points/coupons, merchants scan the user’s QR code, input the points amount, specify the coupon, and execute the transaction. The fee is only 2 yen per transaction. (POS integration will enable direct execution through POS systems)

box2.title: Transparent Records
box2.text1: Issuance and usage records of points/coupons by merchants can be queried at any time for free. The records are stored on a blockchain to ensure they cannot be tampered with or lost.

box3.title: Clear Settlement
box3.text1: Transaction fees for issuance and usage are borne by the using merchant, calculated per transaction. Common points can be settled periodically based on the difference between issued and used points.

carousel.title1: Earn Rewards by Contributing as a Community Member
carousel.text1: Users who participate in community activities and contribute to CarinaChain will receive community points (CRN: Carina Points) as rewards. These platform points can be used to pay platform fees, exchange points, stake, and redeem other prizes.

box1.title: Platform Usage
box1.text: The community will periodically hold events to reward active users. Users can earn points through the flea market, create dual points exchange pools, or complete platform-provided tasks. Points can be exchanged for goods/services/coupons on the platform.

box2.title: Block Verification
box2.text: By staking a certain amount of platform tokens, users can set up block verification nodes on the platform. Running these nodes allows users to earn a portion of the interaction fees as revenue. Users can also earn revenue by delegating their stake to node operators.

box3.title: Points Staking
box3.text: Users can stake their platform points for a specified period and receive a portion of the platform's interaction revenue as rewards.

carousel.title1: Carina Points (CRN) circulate within the entire ecosystem as a medium
carousel.title2: The value of CRN is based on the revenue obtained through products and services on the platform

advantage.text1: The foundation distributes CRN through various community activities and profit plans to expand the community
advantage.text2: Merchants pay the required fees for using products and services on the platform with fiat currency or CRN
advantage.text3: Users pay with CRN for paid services such as point/coupon transfers, market exchanges, and product redemptions
advantage.text4: The revenue obtained by the platform is converted into CRN and given back to the community through the foundation's various activities and profit plans

carousel.title1: Community governance decisions are made through the foundation
carousel.title2: Implemented in the form of entrusting to development and operation corporations

advantage.text2: DAO organization, implementation and execution of community governance decisions, issuance and management of Carina Points (CRN), entrusted with the development and operation of IPIP, planning and implementation of community activities
advantage.text3: Development and Operation Corporation: Implementing IP development and operation under the foundation's trust
advantage.text4: Implementing market operations based on the actual conditions of the local market under the trust of the Development and Operation Corporation
